entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Shelburne
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:43 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -9.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mono Centre 12:00 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
Temperature: -9.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -11.1°C
Wind: ENE 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of freezing drizzle. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle or ice pellets at times mixed with light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few flurries. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle early this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
